New Records: Virat Kohli scored 76 runs, the highest in a T20 World Cup final
Heinrich Klaasen hit the fastest fifty (23 balls) in a World Cup final
Jasprit Bumrah took two crucial wickets, including a memorable delivery
Hardik Pandya took a highlight reel catch
Key Match Events: Bumrah's two wickets in the last over were pivotal
Suryakumar Yadav's catch in the 17th over broke a crucial partnership
Hardik Pandya's over in the 19th restricted South Africa's chase
The game was on the edge after 35 overs
Pre-Game Insights: India's spinners performed well in the middle overs
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's reactions
India's win marked a historical significance
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's batting power but failure to handle key moments
